list_definition.definition: to put (things etc) side by side in order to see to what extent they are the same or different

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: If you compare his work with hers you will find hers more accurate
This is a good essay compared with your last one.

list_definition.definition: to describe as being similar to

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: She compared him to a greedy pig.

list_definition.definition: to be near in standard or quality

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He just can’t compare with Mozart.
